verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Holy, holy, holy, newline Lord God Almighty! newline Early in the morning newline My song shall rise to Thee. newline Holy, holy, holy! newline Merciful and mighty! newline God in three Persons, newline Blessed Trinity!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Holy, holy, holy! newline All the saints adore Thee, newline Casting down their golden crowns newline Around the glassy sea; newline Cherubim and seraphim newline Falling down before Thee, newline Which wert, and art, newline And evermore shall be.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Holy, holy, holy! newline Though the darkness hide Thee, newline Though the eye of sinful man newline Thy glory may not see. newline Only Thou art holy; newline There is none beside Thee newline Perfect in power, newline In love, in purity.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Holy, holy, holy! newline Lord God Almighty! newline All Thy works shall praise Thy name newline In earth, and sky, and sea. newline Holy, holy, holy! newline Merciful and mighty! newline God in three Persons, newline Blessed Trinity.
